headers.subject: [tosdr:3033] [BAD] indemnify ifttt

html:
To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, you agree to hold harmless and indemnify IFTTT, and its employees, officers, agents, or other partners from and against any third party claim arising from or in any way related to your use of the Site or the Service (including anything you develop using IFTTT), including any liability or expense arising from all claims, losses, damages (actual and/or consequential), suits, judgments, litigation costs and attorneys' fees, of every kind and nature. IFTTT shall use good faith efforts to provide you with written notice of such claim, suit or action. 

Same kind of thing that was in Twitpic.

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
